snippet: Stephanie Cutter has emerged as President Obama’s one-woman attack squad, and in the process has become a polarizing face of a campaign that until recently had been dominated by middle-aged white men.
abstract: Stephanie Cutter, a deputy campaign manager for the Obama re-election effort, has emerged as Pres Obama’s one-woman attack squad, and in the process has become a polarizing face of a campaign that until recently had been dominated by middle-aged white men.
lead_paragraph: Stephanie Cutter has emerged as President Obama’s one-woman attack squad, and in the process has become a polarizing face of a campaign that until recently had been dominated by middle-aged white men.

headline.seo: Stephanie Cutter Is a Messenger Who Does the Shooting for Obama
headline.main: A Messenger Who Does the Shooting
headline.print_headline: A Messenger Who Does the Shooting
